definitions.definition: A person who or a thing which influences .
A person who is able to influence consumption , lifestyle , or political preferences of their online audience by creating or engaging social media content, often as a part of a marketing campaign.

main_definition: A person who or a thing which influences . [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( social media , marketing ) A person who is able to influence consumption , lifestyle , or political preferences of their online audience by creating or engaging social media content, often as a part of a marketing campaign.
